data.title: Submission Media / ADC 103rd Annual Awards
data.meta_description: ADC Annual Awards is the oldest running craft and design industry award show in the world. By: The One Club
data.text:
Submission Media

All entries must submit media for judging via the online entry system. Each media type has specific technical requirements, as outlined below.

Submission media options vary by category. Refer to the categories section for details on the submission options for each category.

JUDGING MEDIA: This media will be reviewed by the jury.

SUPPORTING MEDIA: This media is not required, but may be viewed at the jury's discretion.

REFERENCE MEDIA: This media is required, but will not be reviewed by the jury. Examples of reference images include screenshots of the work or the images that were submitted for judging. Reference images are used for administrative purposes only

THUMBNAIL: Every entry requires a thumbnail image. The jury will see this for reference only, it will not be judged.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

ADC is accepting physical entry materials in Brand / Communication Design, Packaging Design, Product Design and Publication Design disciplines. All physical entry materials must be received no later than March 5, 2024. Please send physical entries to The One Club for Creativity, 450 W 31st Street, 6th Floor, New York, NY 10001, Attn: ADC 103rd Annual Awards.
